channel.title: who on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in who on erg home

item.description: eg was founded in 2022 by John Kulas (aka “John-o”), an Industrial and Organizational Psychologist. The mission of eg includes a continuation of collaboration and mentorship for graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology, and these students and former students contribute to eg’s services via structured contract assignments. Dr. Kulas’ resume can be accessed here. Contact eg: Your message: Your contact information (this will never be shared with any 3rd party): Send John-o Kulas:
